text: aur un ke nabee ne unase ye bhee kaha is ke (munaajaanib allaah) baadashaah hone kee ye pahachaan hai ki tumhaare paas vah sandooq aa jaega jisamen tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se tasakeen de cheejen aur un tabburaqaat se bacha khucha hoga jo moosa aur haarun kee aulaad yaadagaar chhod gayee hai aur us sandook ko pharishte uthae hogen agar tum eemaan rakhate ho to beshak usamen tumhaare vaaste pooree nishaanee hai
